thread.title: Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
thread.title_full: Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show

title: Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show
text:
Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd to perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
This year’s star-studded Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show will feature some special guests – Rihanna, Selena Gomez and The Weeknd. 
Taylor Swift has headed the line-up for the past two years, but she’ll have to make way for RiRi – who last performed at the show in 2012. Rihanna performing at the Victoria’s Secret Show in 2012 (Evan Agostini/Invision) 
But it will be a first time experience for Selena, 22, who will no doubt seek advice from best friend Taylor before she takes to the stage. Canadian singer The Weeknd will also be making his debut on the catwalk. 
The musical trio will follow in the footsteps of last year’s acts – Taylor, Ariana Grande, Hozier and Ed Sheeran. Previous musical guests at the glamorous event have included Justin Bieber, Jay Z, Maroon 5 and Nicki Minaj. Taylor Swift performing at the Victoria’s Secret Show (Dominic Lipinski/PA) 
The Weeknd, 25 – real name Abel Tesfaye – is boyfriend to 19-year-old Bella Hadid, whose sister Gigi has previously landed a gig as a Victoria’s Secret model. Share article 
According to the Daily Mirror, the singers will perform at the runway event on December 8 in New York City, alongside the “Angels”– Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosia, Behati Prinsloo, Candice Swanepoel and Lily Aldridge – who will be parading in lingerie. Promoted Stories
